name: Heartthrob
ability: One player is the secret admirer. Each night, learn their character.

name: Romantic
ability: Each night, you learn the character of one of your alive neighbours. Minions and Outsiders register as Townfolk to you.

name: Bachelor
ability: Each night, you learn a random player's character.

name: Drama Queen
ability: Each night*, learn the character of a player that thought you were evil yesterday.

name: Delinquent
ability: You may publicly claim to be the Delinquent. If so, next night learn the character of another alive player who also publicly claimed to be the Delinquent yesterday.

name: Caretaker
ability: Each night, learn an arbitrary character. The next day, you may ask the Storyteller in private, a yes or no question about the character.

name: Goth
ability: Each night*, if someone was executed today learn the character of the last player killed by the Demon. Otherwise, see an arbitrary character.

name: Loner
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: if good, they silently swap characters with you and is then safe from the Demon. A chosen evil silently turns you into a not in play Townsfolk.

name: Pickpocket
ability: Once per game at night, choose an alive player. A chosen non-Demon swaps characters with you & then becomes a not in play outsider. Only you learn your new role.

name: Stargirl
ability: Each night, learn a character according to a certain rule. Each day, privately guess what the rule is: you learn how accurate you are.

name: Method Actor
ability: Each night, learn your character. You might register as a not in play Minion or Demon.

name: Spectator
ability: If your character is about to change, prevent it and wake up that night.

name: Relict
ability: Each night, choose 3 players: learn the most common alignment between them.

name: Dropout
ability: Each night, learn an arbitrary character. If in play, silently swap characters with that player.

name: Stagehand
ability: If you're dead, the storyteller has the ability to silently swap 2 players each night.

name: Jester
ability: Each night, learn an arbitrary character. If you aren't mad as this character the following day, you might be executed.

name: Troublemaker
ability: One of your neighbours registers as the Troublemaker.

name: Body Double
ability: Each night, you may choose a player: Silently swap characters with them. You might register as the Demon. The Demon might register as a Townsfolk or Outsider.

name: Director
ability: Each night, you may choose 2 players. They silently swap characters.

name: Costumer
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself) and learn their character. Then choose a character (not Costumer): that player registers as that character.

name: Playwright
ability: Each night*, if you died from execution, you may silently swap 2 players.

name: Cupid
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Or choose 2 players: they silently swap characters and one of them dies.

name: Lilyth
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they silently swap characters with the last player you killed. Choose another player: they die.

name: Paranoia
ability: You think you are a townsfolk but you are not. Each night*, someone dies. Minions know who you are.

name: Saraab
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbours might register as Demons.

name: Usher
ability: Once per day you may publicly elect a player. If a majority of players agree, you may silently swap their character with a privately chosen player and then lose this ability.

name: Evil Ex
ability: You start knowing one player of opposite alignment who is your ex. The first time they are executed, change alignments. You know a minion rather than the demon, if evil.

name: Duelist
ability: Once per day, you may publicly declare a duel with another player and privately guess their character. If correct: they die.

name: Matchmaker
ability: Once per game at night, choose 2 players: they silently swap characters if they are the same alignment.

name: Hall Monitor
ability: Travelers cannot have their characters swapped.
